description: Pebble object representing a spherical component of a clump. Pebbles are overlapping spheres that form the rigid aggregate shape of a clump. Obtained via clump.pebbles(), itasca.clump.pebble.find(), or itasca.clump.pebble.list().
note: Objects of this type should not be created (instantiated) directly in Python. Pebbles cannot exist independently and are always part of a clump. Use module functions that return instances.

methods.name: id
methods.description: Get pebble ID number. Unique identifier for this pebble.

methods.name: valid
methods.description: Check if this pebble is live (still exists in the model). Returns False if pebble has been deleted.

returns.description: True if pebble exists, False if deleted

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Delete this pebble from its clump. This modifies the clump geometry and may affect clump inertial properties.

methods.name: clump
methods.description: Get the clump object to which this pebble belongs. All pebbles are part of a clump.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Get the clump template this pebble belongs to. Returns None if clump is not associated with a template.

methods.name: pos
methods.description: Get pebble location as vector (x, y, z).

methods.name: pos_x
methods.description: Get X-component of pebble location.

methods.name: pos_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of pebble location.

methods.name: pos_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of pebble location.

methods.name: set_pos
methods.description: Set pebble location (vector). Modifies pebble position within its clump.

methods.name: set_pos_x
methods.description: Set X-component of pebble location.

methods.name: set_pos_y
methods.description: Set Y-component of pebble location.

methods.name: set_pos_z
methods.description: Set Z-component of pebble location.

methods.name: vel
methods.description: Get pebble velocity vector (vx, vy, vz). Pebble velocity is derived from parent clump motion.

methods.name: vel_x
methods.description: Get X-component of pebble velocity.

methods.name: vel_y
methods.description: Get Y-component of pebble velocity.

methods.name: vel_z
methods.description: Get Z-component of pebble velocity.

methods.name: radius
methods.description: Get pebble radius.

methods.name: set_radius
methods.description: Set pebble radius. Modifies the geometry of the parent clump.

methods.name: contacts
methods.signature: pebble.contacts(piece: object = None, all: bool = False, type: type = None) -> tuple[Contact, ...]
methods.description: Get tuple of contacts associated with this pebble. Can filter by piece (Ball/Pebble/Facet), type, and virtual contacts.

parameters.name: piece
parameters.description: Optional Ball, Pebble, or Facet to filter contacts

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by contact type (e.g., BallPebbleContact, PebblePebbleContact)

methods.name: group
methods.description: Get pebble group name in a given slot.

methods.name: groups
methods.description: Get dictionary of all groups this pebble belongs to. Keys are slot names, values are group names.

methods.name: in_group
methods.signature: pebble.in_group(group_name: str | int, slot: str | int = None) -> bool
methods.description: Test if pebble is in a given group. If slot specified, only checks that slot.

methods.name: set_group
methods.signature: pebble.set_group(group_name: str | int, slot: str | int = None) -> None
methods.description: Set pebble group name in a given slot.

methods.name: group_remove
methods.signature: pebble.group_remove(group_name: str | int, slot: str | int = None) -> bool
methods.description: Remove pebble from given group in all or specific slot.

methods.name: has_prop
methods.description: Check if pebble has the given surface property.

methods.name: prop
methods.description: Get a surface property value of this pebble.

methods.name: props
methods.description: Get dictionary of all surface properties of this pebble.

methods.name: set_prop
methods.description: Set a surface property of this pebble.

methods.name: extra
methods.description: Get pebble extra data in given slot.

methods.name: set_extra
methods.description: Set pebble extra data in given slot.
